availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hezekiah Alexander Sr. (Meade County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sophia Barnett Alexander. Father of Sally Alexander White, Nancy Alexander Baker, Priscilla Alexander, Hezekiah Alexander Jr., and Mary Alexander. Resident in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Meade County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky District, p. 172A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 454.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 15391.
KYR-0001-020-0397.
